sandbox-warning: This is a sandbox environment for testing API integration. Never send real funds here!

delete-all-tokens.body: Tüm anahtarlarınızı iptal etmek istediğinizden emin misiniz?

overview.title: API anahtarlarını yönet
overview.name: İsim
overview.subtitle: API anahtarlarını oluştur veya yönet. Daha fazlasını öğrenmek için <0>API anahtarlarımız</0>.
overview.blockchains-hint: Bu API anahtarı bu blok zincirleriyle çalışabilir.
overview.no-tokens: Henüz herhangi bir API anahtarı oluşturulmadı.

step4.your-secret-warning: This is the only time we’ll show you this.
step4.api-key-warning: This is the only time we’ll show you this.

transfer.pending-transfer: You have a pending transfer of {{amount}} {{currencySymbol}}.

fee-information-modal.title: Fee structure
fee-information-modal.desc: Nash calculates a user’s 30-day moving average volume using the volume of trades associated with their account as a percentage of total exchange volume.
fee-information-modal.learn-more: Learn more about maker and taker orders.

time-in-force-modal.title: Time in force
time-in-force-modal.subtitle: Specify the time period for which your order will remain on the book.

gtc.desc: Your order will remain on the book indefinitely – either until it is filled or until you cancel it.

gtt.desc: Your order will remain on the book until the time you specify. If it has not been filled by that time, it will be canceled.

fok.desc: If your entire order can be filled immediately, then it will be. If it cannot be filled entirely, then the whole order will be canceled.

ioc.desc: However much of your order can be filled immediately will be filled. Whatever portion remains unfilled will be canceled.

transfers.tooltip: You still have a transfer initializing. If you close Nash or sign out, it will be paused until you sign in again.

no-longer-sufficient-balance-for-tx: Your balance is no longer sufficient for this transaction.

errors.location-banned: Unfortunately, Nash is unable to operate in your jurisdiction at the moment.
errors.invalid-clock-title: Your computer’s clock is not accurate.
errors.invalid-clock: To trade on Nash your clock must be accurate. <0>Sync your clock</0> then <1>try again</1>.
errors.network-issue: There is a temporary network issue. Please <0>try again</0>.
errors.generic-error: Something went wrong. Please try again.
errors.generic-error-signout: An unexpected error occurred. Please sign out and try again.
errors.within-waiting-period: You must wait five minutes before creating another stake. Your new stake will appear shortly.

password.incorrect: The password you entered was incorrect.

2fa.incorrect: The two-factor authentication code you entered is incorrect. You have a maximum of five attempts.
2fa.already-used: The two-factor authentication code you entered has already been used. Please wait and try again.
2fa.code-expired: The two-factor authentication code you entered has expired. Please wait and try again.
2fa.too-many-failures: You have entered an incorrect code too many times and your account is now permanently locked. Please contact support.
2fa.too-many-failures-signout: You have entered an incorrect code too many times and your account is now permanently locked. You will now be signed out.

cryptography.encryption-failed: Encryption failed. Please sign out and try again.
cryptography.decryption-failed: Decryption failed. Please sign out and try again.

pending.title: Your account is currently being processed!
pending.message: Please check back in a few minutes.

not-found.title: Your account could not be found.

query-errors.why-this-may-happening: Find out why this may have happened <0>here.</0>

banned-country.header: Unfortunately, Nash is unable to operate in your region at the moment.
banned-country.contact-support: Please <0>contact our support team</0> with any questions.

user-messages.contact-support: Please <0>contact our support team</0> for more details.

sandbox.title: Not available in sandbox!
sandbox.content: This feature has been disabled in the sandbox.

location-mismatch.title: Your IP address doesn’t match the country you selected.
location-mismatch.message: Users with a verification level of Tier 0 cannot access all Nash services unless they connect from their country of residence. Consider <0>upgrading to Tier 1</0>.

untrusted-ip.title: We noticed you’re using a VPN.
untrusted-ip.message: Users with a verification level of Tier 0 cannot access all Nash services if they connect via VPN or proxy. Please disable any such services or <0>upgrade to Tier 1</0>.

high-risk-country.title: Your current verification level is Tier 0. As a result, your access to some parts of the Nash platform will be restricted.
high-risk-country.message: To use our full portfolio of services, please <0>upgrade to Tier 1</0>.

duplicate-ip.title: An account has already been created using this IP address.
duplicate-ip.message: To access all Nash services on this account, please <0>upgrade to Tier 1</0>.

us.title: Not all Nash services are currently supported in {{usState}}. Your access to some parts of the Nash platform will be restricted.
us.title-no-state: Not all Nash services are currently supported in your state. Your access to some parts of the Nash platform will be restricted.
us.message: We will notify you by email when {{usState}} is fully supported. Please <0>contact our support team</0> with any questions.
us.message-no-state: We will notify you by email when your state is fully supported. Please <0>contact our support team</0> with any questions.

generic.title: Not all Nash services are currently supported in your present location. Your access to some parts of the Nash platform will be restricted.
generic.message: Please <0>contact our support team</0> with any questions.

tier-too-low.title: Your current verification level is Tier {{userTier}}. As a result, your access to some parts of the Nash platform will be restricted.
tier-too-low.message: To use our full portfolio of services, please <0>upgrade to Tier {{minTier}}</0>.

location-mismatch.title: We noticed you’re signing in from {{detectedCountry}}.
location-mismatch.message: If you no longer live in {{accountCountry}}, please <0>contact our support team</0> to update your address.

use-desktop-for-advanced-exchange.title: Browse on desktop for a better experience.
use-desktop-for-advanced-exchange.message: The ‘Pro’ view is designed for desktop usage. If you are on mobile, try the <0>‘Basic’ view</0>.

errors.generic-error: Error signing up for an account. Please try again.
errors.invalid-referral-code: Invalid referral code. Please check your code and try again.
errors.invalid-email-domain: Your email provider is not allowed. Please use a different address.
errors.duplicate-email: An account has already been created for this email address.
errors.password-too-short: Your password should be at least eight characters long.
errors.invalid-recaptcha: Recaptcha verification failed. Please try again.
errors.missing-us-state: If you live in the United States, you must enter your state.

disclaimer.title: Notice for US customers
disclaimer.desc: You are creating a preliminary Nash account to participate in the referral program, but your state must be eligible to access some Nash services. If eligible, you will later be asked to sign a user agreement.

referrals.title: Nash referral program
referrals.desc: This will be used to track referrals for future Nash promotions.

untrusted-ip.title: We noticed you’re using a VPN.
untrusted-ip.message: Please disable any VPN or proxy services to continue. Once you have created an account, you can verify your identity to use a VPN in future.

confirm-country.label: I confirm that this is my country of residence.

confirm-country-and-state.label: I confirm that these are my country and state of residence.

errors.password-too-weak: The password you chose is too weak.

password-tips.title: Tips for a strong password
password-tips.desc: A strong password is essential to keep your funds secure. Follow these tips to stay safe:
password-tips.tip-1: Do not reuse a password from other websites, even if you change individual words or characters. If you are phished or hacked elsewhere, your Nash account will instantly be compromised.
password-tips.tip-2: Do not include personal information in your password. Names, birthdays and addresses are easy to find out and should be avoided.
password-tips.tip-3: Make your password at least twelve characters long and use a mixture of upper and lowercase letters, numbers and special characters.
password-tips.tip-4: Consider using a password generator to create and store maximally secure passwords.

password.desc: Use a mixture of upper and lowercase letters, numbers and special characters for a stronger password.

verify-email.desc-1: Please check your email and verify your account.
verify-email.desc-2: If you don’t see our email, check your junk folder.

errors.generic-error: Error resending verification email. Please try again.

general-information.title: General information
general-information.desc-1: Your personal account is generated using twelve secret words. If you lose your password, you can access your account and reset it using these words. For this reason, you absolutely must back up your twelve secret words properly.

chart.card-top-right: Nash account recovery if password is forgotten
chart.diamond-two: Generate your personal account, which contains…

secret-words.title: Secret words
secret-words.header: Write down your twelve secret words
secret-words.desc: These words are used to access your funds. You will also need them to reset your password.
secret-words.popup-error: If you wish to print your secret words, please disable any popup blockers and allow Nash to open popups.

tips.do: Do write down your words by hand.
tips.dont: Don’t screengrab or store your words digitally.

print-warning.title: Print your twelve secret words
print-warning.header: Please make sure your printer is secure!
print-warning.body-desc: If you choose to print your words, make sure:
print-warning.body-tips-0: Your printer is connected to your computer directly with a USB cable.
print-warning.body-tips-1: Your printer is not connected to a network of any kind.
print-warning.body-tips-2: It is impossible for others to connect to your printer via Bluetooth, WLAN, etc.

backup-print.desc-1: Your twelve secret words can be used to access your ETH, NEO and other accounts if you lose your Nash password.
backup-print.desc-2: Remember: if anyone gains access to your words, your funds are in danger.
backup-print.desc-3: Cut out the slips below. Consider laminating them and storing them in two separate locations.

repeat-secret-words.desc: We want to make sure you wrote down your secret words.

errors.create-wallet-failed: There was an error when creating your account. Please <0>sign out</0> and try again.

wallet-created.header: Your Nash account was created successfully!
wallet-created.desc: You can find your twelve secret words and individual account details under ‘My profile > Accounts’.
wallet-created.warning: <0>We do not store your secret words in any location.</0> If you forget your password, you will not be able to access your funds without these words.

2fa.title: Two-factor authentication
2fa.desc: Two-factor authentication (2FA) adds an extra layer of security to your account.

1.header: Download and install an authenticator app

2.header: Scan this QR code with your chosen downloaded app

3.header: Enter the verification code generated by your authenticator app
3.input-error: The code you entered was incorrect.

confirm.header: Two-factor authentication has been set up!
confirm.desc: You can find your two-factor authentication preferences under ‘My profile > Security’ within the Nash web platform.
confirm.action: What do you want to do now?

messages.create-order-blocked: You are unable to create orders on the exchange for this market in your region.

tips.balance: <0>Tip</0> <1>Send funds to the trading contract here.</1> <2 />

market-selection.no-results: We couldn’t find any results for <0>{{searchTerm}}</0>.
market-selection.no-favorites: You have no favorite markets yet.

favorite-bar.empty: <0>Your favorite markets</0> appear as links here.

locked-trading-session.information-tooltip: Sessions are locked when you refresh the page or are idle for 15 minutes.

market-orders-disabled.desc: There are currently not enough orders on the book for market orders to be processed.

amount.label: Amount
amount.sub-label-market-buy: This is a market order, so we can only estimate the amount of {{currencyA}} you will buy.
amount.sub-label-market-sell: This is a market order, so we can only estimate of the total {{currencyB}} you will receive.
amount.sub-label-limit-buy: Enter the amount of {{currencySymbol}} you wish to receive.
amount.sub-label-limit-sell: Enter the amount of {{currencySymbol}} you wish to sell.

errors.is-past: You cannot enter a time in the past

market-price.label: Market
market-price.sub-label: When you buy or sell at market price your order will match with orders currently on the book.

limit-price.label: Limit
limit-price.sub-label: Your order can match with orders at this price or better.

errors.maker-match: ‘Post only’ orders that match in the current order book will be canceled.

stop-price.label: Stop
stop-price.sub-label: Stop price acts as a trigger for another order.

errors.stop-trigger-immediately: This stop price will trigger your order immediately.

maker-only.label: Post only
maker-only.sub-label: ‘Post only’ will place your order as a maker only, not a taker. It may not fill.

errors.order-rejected-insufficient-funds: Your order was rejected because you lack sufficient funds.
errors.order-rejected-daily-limit-reached: Your order was rejected because you have reached your daily trading limit.
errors.generic: Error placing your order. Please try again.

create-order.signin-or-create-an-account: <0>Sign in</0> or <1>create an account</1> to place an order.

my-orders.auth: Sign in to view your orders.

signed-out.title: <0>Get started</0> <1>with Nash</1>
signed-out.subtitle: Create an account in under a minute – no KYC required!

no-results.date-range: You have no orders in the given date range.
no-results.active: You have no open or filled orders.

popup.no-selection: Select a date range to continue

my-orders.no-trades: You have no trades to export

trade-history-times.header: Select a set timeframe to export

btc.title: You can now send, receive and store Bitcoin with Nash!
btc.subtext: We’ll notify you when Bitcoin trading pairs are available on the Nash Exchange.

session-expiry-modal.title: Your session is about to expire
session-expiry-modal.info: Your session is about to expire owing to inactivity. You will be signed out in {{count}} second.
session-expiry-modal.info_plural: Your session is about to expire owing to inactivity. You will be signed out in {{count}} seconds.

messages.vpn-warning-title: We noticed you’re using a VPN.
messages.vpn-warning-body: Please disable any VPN or proxy services to continue.

update-country.failed: We could not update your country of residence. Please try again later or contact support.

confirm-country.label: I confirm that this is my country of residence.

confirm-country-and-state.label: I confirm that these are my country and state of residence.

password-change.success: If the email address you provide matches an account already in our database, we’ll send you instructions on how to reset your password.

update-email.validation-success: We have sent a verification email to your new email address. Please click the link in that email to confirm your new address.
update-email.updated-success: Your email address has been updated. You can now sign in using your new address.

verify-email.success: Your email address has been verified. Please sign in to set up your account.
verify-email.error: Could not verify email address. The verification code may have expired. Please log in and request another verification email.

errors.invalid-email: The email address you provided is invalid.
errors.signin-failed: It appears your email or password is incorrect.
errors.locked: Your account is temporarily locked. Please try again later.
errors.revoked: Your account is permanently locked. Please contact support.

forgot-password.desc: Enter your email address below and we’ll get you back on track.
forgot-password.success: We’ve sent you a password reset email. If you don’t see our email, check your junk folder.

reset-password.missing-email: Something went wrong. Please click the link in your email again.
reset-password.expired-code: This session is no longer valid. Please click the link in your email again.

home.header: Do you still have your twelve secret words?
home.sub-header: When you first set up your Nash account, we asked you to write these words down and keep them safe.
home.button-have-words: Yes, I still have my secret words
home.button-lost-words: No, I have lost my secret words
home.desc: Unfortunately, if you have lost both your old password and your twelve secret words, you will be unable to recover your funds.

edit.desc-1: We use your secret words to regenerate your master seed and individual asset accounts.
edit.desc-2: If you cannot provide the twelve words for your existing accounts, <0>your funds will be lost.</0>
edit.mnemonic-invalid: This combination of words is not valid. Please double-check and try again.
edit.mnemonic-valid: This combination of words is valid. You may now reset your password.

skip.header: You will lose access to your funds
skip.desc-1: If you have lost both your old password and your twelve secret words, <0>you will be unable to recover your funds.</0>
skip.desc-2: Nash is a non-custodial platform that uses decentralized technology. It is impossible for us to access your funds and we cannot recover them.
skip.desc-3: You can reset your old account and choose a new set of secret words. This will be like setting up a brand new account with a new password.
skip.desc-4: If you choose to reset your account, you will lose all access to your funds, including:
skip.desc-5: Please double-check and see if you can locate either your secret words or your password.
skip.checkbox-1: I have lost both my password and my twelve secret words.
skip.checkbox-2: I understand that I will lose all access to my funds if I reset my account.
skip.sub-bullet-1: All assets in your personal account.
skip.sub-bullet-2: All assets in the trading contract.
skip.sub-bullet-4: All dividends from staked NEX tokens.
skip.unauthorized: Since resetting your account has serious implications, you must first contact our support team to enable it.

new-password.desc: Create a new password for your Nash account.
new-password.desc-success-reset: You will be able to set up new wallets the next time you sign in.

errors.password-too-weak: The password you chose is too weak.

errors.reset-wallets-locked: Account resetting is currently locked. Please contact support.
errors.reset-locked: Password resetting is currently locked. Please contact support.
errors.incorrect-keys: The public key derived from the twelve words you submitted does not match our records. This indicates that the twelve words you submitted are not from your Nash account. Please double-check your backup. Contact support if you still have issues.
errors.generic-error: Something went wrong and your password was not reset. Your password reset link may have expired. Please request a new reset link and try again.

login.title: Log in to the Nash Community
login.description: You’ll need a Nash account to log in to the Nash Community.

create-account.title: Create your Nash Community account
create-account.description: To post messages on the Community, you’ll need to stake at least 1 NEX for 24 months.
create-account.migrate-description: If you’re using the Nash Extension to log in to the Community, you can <0>migrate your account</0>.
create-account.username-exits: ‘{{username}}’ is already taken. Please choose another username.

migrate-account.title: Migrate your Nash Community account
migrate-account.migration-step1: Log in with the Nash Extension.
migrate-account.migration-step2: Change your Community email address to the address used by your Nash account.
migrate-account.migration-step3: That’s it! Once your email address is changed, you’ll be able to log in using your Nash account.
migrate-account.button-migrate: Log in with the Nash Extension

faq-change-email.title: How do I change my Community email address?
faq-change-email.step1: Once you’ve logged in to the Community, click on your avatar in the top right-hand corner of the screen.
faq-change-email.step2: Click on your username and select ‘Preferences’.
faq-change-email.step3: Click the pencil icon to edit your email address.
faq-change-email.step4: Enter a new email address and click ‘Change’.
faq-change-email.step5: You’ll receive two confirmation emails, one at your old email address and one at your new address. You’ll need to confirm both addresses to complete the change.

discourse-sso.unknow-error-message: Something went wrong, please try again.

errors.order-rejected-insufficient-funds: Insufficient {{currencySell}} in trading contract. Send funds to continue.
errors.order-rejected-daily-limit-reached: Your order was rejected because you have reached your daily trading limit.
errors.generic: Error placing your order. Please try again.

exchange-info.title: How to exchange tokens
exchange-info.desc: First, select the tokens you want to exchange.
exchange-info.price-options-header: You have two options for choosing your price:

average-market-price.desc: Place your order at current market price so that it fills sooner. Unfilled portions will cancel automatically after 24 hours.

set-a-price.desc: Your order can match with orders at this price or better, but will not go beyond it. This option means your order might not all fill at once.

balances.desc: We will tell you if your balance is insufficient for making a trade. Choose ‘Balances’ to check your account status and send/receive funds.

header.sell: Select the token you want to trade
header.buy: Select the token you want to receive

search.placeholder: Search for a token name or ticker…
search.no-results: We couldn’t find any results for <0>{{search}}</0>.
search.no-results-no-query: We couldn’t find any matching currencies

disabled.maintenance: This token is under scheduled maintenance.
disabled.deposits-withdrawals-suspended: Deposits and withdrawals are suspended until further notice.

errors.insufficient-funds: Insufficient {{currencySell}} in trading contract. Send funds to continue.
errors.limit-breached: This order exceeds your trading limits.

warnings.20-below: The specified price is more than 20% below the current market price.

exchange-tokens.toggle-limit: Set a price for this trade

review-order.desc: Your order will remain on the book until it is filled, you cancel it, or 24 hours have passed.

insufficient-funds.0: Your trading contract balance is no longer sufficient to cover this order. This can happen if you are creating orders in multiple browser tabs at the same time.
insufficient-funds.1: For a smoother trading experience, please use Nash in a single browser tab.
insufficient-funds.2: <0>Send/Receive</0> funds if you wish to place this order again.

daily-limit-reached.0: Your order has been rejected because you have reached your daily trading limit.
daily-limit-reached.1: To increase your maximum daily trading volume, please visit <0>Limits</0>.

generic.0: Error placing your order. Please try again.

tier0.buy-popular-assets: Buy and sell popular digital assets
tier0.complete-kyc-5minute: Upgrade to Tier 1 identity verification in just five minutes!
tier0.higher-trading-limits: Higher trading limits on the Nash exchange.
tier0.use-with-vpn: Access Nash through a VPN service.

provider.title: Select a provider
provider.subtitle: Digital asset providers are third-party companies partnered with Nash who allow you to buy and sell digital assets using national currencies.

provider.have-account-header: Providers I have created an account with
provider.no-account-header: Providers I have not created an account with

provider.no-providers-more-info: Learn more about <0>becoming a Nash currency partner</0>.

nash.pay-no-fees: <0>Pay no fees</0> when you buy popular digital assets from Nash!

general-details.subtitle: Before you can buy or sell digital assets, we need to set up your account with {{providerName}}.

address-details.subtitle: Before you can buy or sell digital assets, we need to set up your account with {{providerName}}.

profile-errors.legalName: You must enter your full legal name.
profile-errors.email: You must enter your email address and format it correctly.
profile-errors.streetName: You must enter your street name.
profile-errors.countyState: You must enter your county or state.

errors.unsupported-state: US state is not supported by Wyre
errors.plaid-not-ready: Wyre is having difficulty communicating with your bank
errors.carbon-timeout-body: Your transaction failed because of an API request timeout. Carbon has been notified of this error

order-book-cache-empty.title: Order book cache is empty
order-book-cache-empty.body: Could not generate a price. Please try again later.

not-enough-liquidity.title: Insufficent liquidity for order
not-enough-liquidity.body: Your order is too large to process right now. Please try again later.

buy-sell.title: Buy/Sell
buy-sell.complete-nash-profile: Complete your <0>Nash profile</0> before you can buy digital assets
buy-sell.exceed-daily-limit: You have exceeded your daily limit.
buy-sell.current-exchange-info: <0>This quote is based on our current exchange rate.</0> If the {{asset}} price is above <1 /> when your bank transfer clears, we will offer a new rate.
buy-sell.carbon-unsupported: This feature isn’t available with Carbon yet.
buy-sell.provider-unsupported: This feature isn’t available with {{providerName}} yet.
buy-sell.default-warning-message: You need to complete your <0>{{providerName}} profile</0> and <1>link a bank account</1> before you can {{buy}} {{asset}}.
buy-sell.bank-account-warning-message: You need to <0>link a bank account</0> before you can {{buy}} {{asset}}.
buy-sell.fiat-provider-warning-message: You need to complete your <0>{{providerName}} profile</0> before you can {{buy}} {{asset}}.

purchase-failure.title: There was a problem. The purchase did not go through.
purchase-failure.ecode-declined: Your bank has declined the transaction.
purchase-failure.ecode-only-visa-mastercard: Only Visa and Mastercard are currently accepted by Carbon.money.
purchase-failure.ecode-3ds-could-not-be-performed: 3DS is not available from Carbon right now.
purchase-failure.ecode-3ds-performed-not-completed: 3DS was performed, but could not be completed by Carbon right now.

purchase-requires-confirm.title: Verify new card
purchase-requires-confirm.message: For your security, we need to verify your card. Carbon will produce a transaction on your bank statement containing a four-digit confirmation code, like ‘carbon-1234’.

purchase-success.title: Success!
purchase-success.amount-debit: The amount plus fees will be debited from your card {{card}}. You will receive {{asset}} in your Nash personal account shortly.
purchase-success.view: You can view the status of your transaction <0>here</0>.

transactions.fail_nopop: Failed: Proof not uploaded in time
transactions.title: Transaction history with {{providerName}}
transactions.no-matching-data-sub-header: Your search didn’t match any purchases or sales.
transactions.no-data-header: You haven’t made any transactions yet.
transactions.no-data: You haven’t made any transactions yet. <0>Purchase digital assets</0> to get started.

detailed-quote-status.failed-expired-on-bank-transfer-reason: Your quote expired before we received your payment
detailed-quote-status.failed-expired-on-confirmation-reason: You did not accept your quote in time and it expired

payments-methods.title: Payment methods linked with {{providerName}}
payments-methods.delete-modal-title: Are you sure you want to remove the card ending {{cardEnding}}?

credit-card.carbon-accepts-3d-secure: Carbon accepts only 3-D Secure credit cards from

reconfirm.message: If the webpage or session is closed before accepting the new rate it will be declined automatically and your payment will be refunded.

reconfirm-expire.no-action: <0>No more actions are needed from you.</0> You can now close this page.
reconfirm-expire.message: The quote expired before you made a decision, or the webpage was closed without accepting or declining the new amount and rate give.

reconfirm-accept.no-action: <0>No more actions are needed from you.</0> You can now close this page.

reconfirm-decline.no-action: <0>No more actions are needed from you.</0> You can now close this page.

carbon.verification-failed: Identity verification failed. Please update and resubmit your information.
carbon.enable-2fa-before-proceeding: You must <0>enable two-factor authentication for Carbon</0> to make this purchase.

submit-kyc.required-incomplete: You must complete all required fields.

editor.warning: I understand that if I resubmit this information my account will need to be reviewed again and I will not be able to make any purchases or sales until this review has been completed.

statements.no-statements: You don’t have any dividend statements yet.

header.title: What is NEX staking?
header.desc: Staking Nash Exchange tokens (NEX) is a way to earn passive income. You receive a portion of the exchange’s trading fees every day that your stake is active.

par-1.title: How does it work?
par-1.desc: You lock as many of your NEX tokens as you want in a staking contract. You will not be able to move or sell your tokens while they are locked in the contract. Every day that your stake is active you will receive dividends.

par-2.title: How are dividends calculated?
par-2.desc: Dividends depend on: (1) the number of NEX tokens you stake as a proportion of the total 50,000,000 supply, and (2) the period of time for which you stake them. The more tokens you stake, the higher your dividend will be. The longer you stake your tokens for, the greater the proportion of fees you receive will be (your ‘staking rate’).

par-3.title: How long can I stake for?
par-3.desc: The minimum staking period is one month, which offers a staking rate of 25%. However, if you want a higher proportion of the exchange’s fees, you can stake for any whole number of months up to a maximum of 24, which offers a staking rate of 75%.

par-4.title: How do I receive my dividends?
par-4.desc: Dividends are automatically added to your trading contract balance. They are paid out on a daily basis, shortly after midnight UTC. Nash provides monthly staking statements that aggregate these payments into a single figure for accounting purposes. Since the fees on a trade are charged in the currency being exchanged, you will receive dividends in every asset currently being traded on Nash.

par-5.title: Can I receive my dividends in a single currency?
par-5.desc: No. For legal reasons, we cannot convert your dividends for you. However, we are developing a tool to allow you to convert dividends yourself with a single click.

par-6.title: Can I edit or cancel my stake once it’s been created?
par-6.desc: No. Once you have created a stake you will not be able to edit or cancel it.

par-7.title: Can I create multiple stakes?
par-7.desc: Yes. If you have NEX tokens in your personal account that are not already locked in a stake, you can use them to create a new one.

par-8.title: How many stakes can I create?
par-8.desc: There is no limit to the number of stakes you can create.

create-stake.create-stake-disclaimer-label: I understand that staked NEX only pays dividends if the Nash Exchange generates revenue.
create-stake.title: Create your stake
create-stake.amount-to-stake-tooltip:
Staking rate determines the size of your proportionate share of revenue from the Nash Exchange. The longer you stake your NEX, the higher your staking rate will be, with a maximum rate of 75% for a two-year stake.

<0>An example dividend</0>
Dividends are paid out daily. Say that Nash has generated fees equivalent to $1,000,000 in the last 24 hours and that a user owns 1,000 NEX tokens out of the total 50,000,000 supply. If the user has staked NEX at the two-year staking rate of 75%, they are eligible for a dividend worth: $1,000,000 ∗ 1,000 / 50,000,000 ∗ 0.75 = $15.
create-stake.set-date-dividends-label: Set a date to receive your dividends
create-stake.agreed-to-non-cancellation-label: I understand that I cannot cancel or edit this stake once I have created it.
create-stake.agreed-to-locked-tokens-label: I understand that my NEX tokens will be locked until this stake is complete.
create-stake.create-stake-sending-text: Sending data. Please keep this window open. This can take up to one minute.
create-stake.create-stake-error: There was either an error or a delay while creating your stake. Please check again in five minutes and resubmit if your stake was not created.
create-stake.amount-error-message: This amount exceeds your available balance.
